name: Julius Ionescu
message: I ordered my plain pizza, Margherita. Food with few ingredients is a challenge to make memorable. Only the best chefs can do that!Very good, the people are very nice, the price is good.

name: Naomi Watson
message: I rarely order pizza, and I want it to be worth the calories and not have any regrets when I eat it! I have ordered from most of the pizzerias around and I can assure you that none are as good as the pizza at Resto!

name: Andrew Ionescu
message: Delicious lunch! I used to love this place and for sure I will in the future, because of their unique ideas and of course delicious pasta.

name: Olivia Dobs
message: I just love the Resto's dishes! I've tried their famous pizza's and also the pasta with shrimps. I think it's a familly bussines and they're doing a great job! Quality food and tasty too!
